import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import Syria from './assets/syriacover.jpg'; import Thai from './assets/thaicavecover.png'; import Crossword from './assets/nytcrossword.jpg'; import GasTracer from './assets/gastracer.gif'; import Molex1 from './assets/2080card.png'; import Palette from './assets/playfulpalette2.jpg'; import PaletteResults from './assets/playfulpalette-results.png'; import PaletteResults2 from './assets/playfulpalette-results2.png'; import Kessler from './assets/kessler-3.png'; import SGB from './assets/blackoutday2020.png'; //icons import Github from './assets/icons/svg/032-github.svg'; import Youtube from './assets/icons/svg/116-youtube.svg'; class Portfolio extends Component { render() { const slideImages = [ Syria, Thai, Crossword ]; const properties = { duration: 5000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, prevArrow:
, nextArrow:
}; return (

1 of 5

Project

{/*

Adobe's Playful Palette

*/}

coding

ux design

For my senior design project, I recreated Adobe's Playful Palette, an interactive parametric color mixer for digital paint applications that mimics and enhances the traditional painting process. The palette allows you to blend color blobs to create gradients and easily recolor strokes with an infinite history.



Tools Used: WebGL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

2 of 5

Project

Disney Imagineering

visual design

3d modeling

digital painting

Chosen as one of six teams from over 250 nationally as part of the 2019 Imaginations Design Competition, my team conceptualized and created Kessler Project, an all-day space adventure that allows guests to experience the excitement of space travel. As Creative Director, I led design and development of all visual art, both 2d and 3d, for our submission slides and presentation to the Imagineering executives.



Read more about it here and here.



Tools Used: Maya, KeyShot, Photoshop, Illustrator

3 of 5

Internship

{/*
*/}

The New York Times

prototyping

research

coding

animation

As a Graphics intern on the Immersive team, I prototyped 3-D assets to visualize AR moments, researched and tested the use of the Microsoft Hololens in future articles, and contributed cover images and assets here and here. During the Maker's Week Hackathon, I also helped build the front end for our intern-led 3-D Crossword project.



Tools Used: Maya, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Sketchfab

4 of 5

Internship

Molex

visual design

animation

photography

As a Product Management Intern, I conceptualized and designed all infographics, 2d and 3d, to market the company's new line of power connectors. Through the development of VR/AR mockups for both web and mobile, I was able to introduce new applications and immersive technology to the Digital Marketing team.



Tools Used: Maya, KeyShot, Illustrator, After Effects

5 of 5

Volunteering

Spicy Green Book and Black Power Blueprint

graphic design

On the side, I contribute graphic design to Spicy Green Book and Black Power Blueprint. Spicy Green Book is a team of volunteers committed to help compile a directory of black owned businesses, while Black Power Blueprint is a program that strives to transform North St. Louis through renovation, economic development, and political power by and for the black community.



Tools Used: Maya, KeyShot, Illustrator, After Effects

) } } export default Portfolio;
